title: Red lentil and bacon soup
ingredients: ['oil for cooking', '500g cooking bacon, chopped', '1 onion, diced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '250g red lentils', '1L chicken stock', '2 teaspoons English mustard', '1 dash Worcestershire sauce', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 teaspoons sugar', 'pepper', 'instant potato mash for thickening (optional)']
